name: qqqrinkappp Anime Style
description:
Trained from art by qqqrinkappp from the various booru sites.

Model trained on anything v4.5

From testing I've found that a hypernetwork weight of around 0.8 seems to work best, depending on your settings you may want to play with this value.

In order to get outputs closer to the original style I've added "starry_sky_print, starry_sky, (traditional_media:1.2), (light_particles:1.2), depth_of_field, milky way, blurry" as prompts

meta.prompt: rem \(re:zero\), <hypernet:qqqrinkappp:0.775>, starry_sky_print, starry_sky, (traditional_media:1.2), (light_particles:1.2), depth_of_field, milky way, blurry, upper body, short hair, maid, (best lighting:1.1), CG, wallpaper, HD, high quality, high-definition, extremely detailed, (detailed light:1.1), (masterpiece:1.1), (best quality:1.2), (highres:1.1), jewel-like eyes, award winning
